about_the_game:
Health is the new wealth! Protect yourself and anyone around you. As a new graduate from Immunis School, you are returning to your hometown to find out a massive fantasy world is waiting for you to shape your own destiny and forge your own path. Make the world a better place, OR DON’T!! Your pick.



Explore cities and villages filled with long history and rich cultures. Complete thousands of quests and unlock the secrets that lie within each village.



Manage and decorate your own clinic and hospital. Hire staff and friends, and decide how much you're willing to pay them. You can even have them work for free, if you can prove yourself!



Discover the captivating stories of the world and each of NPCs. Befriend monsters and other hidden races. Solve story scenarios in a few different ways and make decisions that shape your path. Learn to live in harmony…or be the chaos!



Tame monsters and create friendships with them. Wait for the magical things to happen. (They will finish chores for you.)



Live your life and choose your ultimate career path (hospital tycoon, CEO, school headmaster, farmer, chef, etc) by building the necessary skills---curing patients, farming, fishing, mining, cooking, crafting, etc. Get to know the townspeople. Another meaning to friends with benefits! Befriend all kinds of people to get tons of rewards! You can explore all types of love and desires. Easily Conquer love. YOU CHOOSE!



Discover your Immunis power and forge your own genetic path! Edit your genes to protect yourself from diseases.



Save people's lives through various battles by summoning immune cells and fighting bacteria and viruses inside human body!



By collecting unique cards, build your ultimate Deck and challenge other card players with tons of rewards. (Cards can also be used as items to enhance skills and unlock the world’s secrets, so you might want to collect as many as you can.)



Play minigames to save patients' lives and raise town reputation and money. Create and discover special dishes through a variety of recipes.
detailed_description:
Health is the new wealth! Protect yourself and anyone around you. As a new graduate from Immunis School, you are returning to your hometown to find out a massive fantasy world is waiting for you to shape your own destiny and forge your own path. Make the world a better place, OR DON’T!! Your pick.



Explore cities and villages filled with long history and rich cultures. Complete thousands of quests and unlock the secrets that lie within each village.



Manage and decorate your own clinic and hospital. Hire staff and friends, and decide how much you're willing to pay them. You can even have them work for free, if you can prove yourself!



Discover the captivating stories of the world and each of NPCs. Befriend monsters and other hidden races. Solve story scenarios in a few different ways and make decisions that shape your path. Learn to live in harmony…or be the chaos!



Tame monsters and create friendships with them. Wait for the magical things to happen. (They will finish chores for you.)



Live your life and choose your ultimate career path (hospital tycoon, CEO, school headmaster, farmer, chef, etc) by building the necessary skills---curing patients, farming, fishing, mining, cooking, crafting, etc. Get to know the townspeople. Another meaning to friends with benefits! Befriend all kinds of people to get tons of rewards! You can explore all types of love and desires. Easily Conquer love. YOU CHOOSE!



Discover your Immunis power and forge your own genetic path! Edit your genes to protect yourself from diseases.



Save people's lives through various battles by summoning immune cells and fighting bacteria and viruses inside human body!



By collecting unique cards, build your ultimate Deck and challenge other card players with tons of rewards. (Cards can also be used as items to enhance skills and unlock the world’s secrets, so you might want to collect as many as you can.)



Play minigames to save patients' lives and raise town reputation and money. Create and discover special dishes through a variety of recipes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Harvest Health

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You’ve graduated from Xepheria School of Immunis and inherited your grandfather’s clinic in the Springs Hope Village. Design your own clinic. When you are not fighting bacteria inside the body, mingle with villagers by farming, joining festivals, recruiting friends, raising monsters, and dating!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
